features: FULL DINNER SET - Set of 2 pet small pet bowl measures 4.25 Dia x 2H", suitable for medium and large cats and dogs. California Prop 65 compliant and FDA food safe
DURABLE MATERIAL & EASY TO CLEAN - Pet bowl is made of Porcelain Ceramic with a silicone ring to keep from sliding on the floor. Conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. No Fuss
NON-SKIDDING & FLIPPING - Silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet's bowl from sliding around on the floor and help keep the bowl upright. No messy floors to clean
PAWTASTIC DESIGN - Delight your hungry pup or sassy cat with a fun printed food or water dish. Stylish and simple design will blend in with any décor in your home or kitchen
MORE BONE DRY PET OPTIONS - Bone Dry offers various pet products including pet bed, pet towels, pet mats, pet bowls, blankets, and toy storage. Search Bone Dry for more pet products
body.description: DII offers a full collection of trend-based designs for all seasons. Incorporating the hottest colors and themes, DII brings you a fresh, innovative line of kitchen products, tabletop, gifts, and home decor for every season, every holiday and everyone. IDEAL SOLUTIONS FOR FOOD STORAGE: Treat canister measures 4"(D) x6.5" (H), perfect for storing pet food, treats for dogs and cats or even your cookies, coffee, tea, cocoa, pasta, spice and herbs! MATERIAL AND CARE: Ceramic Canister is Dishwasher Safe; Hand wash Bamboo Lids and Towel Dry KEEP PET TREAT & FOOD DRY AND FRESH: Bamboo lid allow the food/treat to breath through yet silicone rim airtight the jar to keep out moisture, humidity and pests. TRENDY DESIGN TO MATCH WITH YOUR HOME DÉCOR: Lattice with paw print goes well with any home décor. You can find it match with Bone dry pet bed and pet bowl. Get the whole collection now! MORE BONE DRY PET OPTIONS - Bone Dry offers various pet products including pet bed, pet towels, pet mats, pet bowls, blankets, and toy storage. Search Bone Dry for more items. DII offers delightful Kitchen Linens including dishtowels, dish cloths, aprons, potholders and oven mitts. You can trust DII when selecting functional, stylish and affordable home accessories. Let DII products become a valuable part of your life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bone Dry Ceramic Pet Bowl & Canister Collection Show your pets some love by giving them treats in these adorable pet bowls available in a variety of sizes, colors, and prints!

PAW-tastic Design! Delight your hungry pup or sassy cat with a fun printed food & water bowl. Stylish & simple designs will blend in with your home & kitchen décor. These pet bowls and canisters are so easy to care for. Bowls are ceramic with a silicone ring at the base to keep the bowls from sliding on the floor and to help keep the bowl upright. They are also dishwasher safe for your convenience. There's no fuss so you can spend more time with your pets.

Ceramic Treat Canister Canisters approximately measure 4 x 4 x 6.5" (L x W x H). These are perfect for storing treats or even your cookies, coffee, or tea! Bamboo Lid The pet canisters come with a bamboo lid that allow treats to breath yet the silicone, airtight rim keeps out moisture, humidity, & pests. Set of 2 Pet Bowls You can get matching sets for food & water. You can also mix & match by getting single units in each color or design. Size Guide Pet bowls are available in multiple sizes. Small: Holds 3/4 cups.Medium: Holds 1 3/4 cups.Large: Holds 3 cups.

Bone Dry Bowls & Treat Jars Bone Dry provides you with adorable, functional and stylish products for your pets, such as bath towels, toys, ceramic bowls, treat jars, storage bins, baskets, blankets, and more! Be sure to visit our brand store to view more products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks identical to the photograph online. Perfect size for a small dog and really cute, not gaudy or tacky looking. Bought it is a gift for a friend and she’s very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for the sweet toy poodle that I watch for her meals. It is just perfect for the amount of food she eats. Plus it's darling. This set will last for years because it's ceramic. It would also work great for a cat's food and water bowl. The small is very small so do be aware of that. For me it is just what I needed.Thank You

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really small but cute
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely small dog bowls. Even for little dogs, they are small. Be sure to check the measurements before you buy. Still, they are very well made and cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dog ceramic dishes
reviews.reviewText: Just a bit small than expected. Otherwise made well and pretty. Made for small dogs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a 8 lb Shii-poo, and a 6 lb Yorkie. These bowls are perfect for their food! The non- slide bottom is awesome! I would buy this bowl again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice bowls, but heavy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these bowls and didn't expect them to be so heavy. I can see where I may drop them and have it crack all over the floor. They're pretty and clean, I use them as back up bowls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great size for my small dog very well made do not slid excellent
